attributes.action: hold a referendum on the signing of the European treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is calling for a referendum to be held with regards to the european treaty so the people can decide whether Britain should have to lose some of its constitutional powers

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LTPD07/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
